Title: Chicken Parm
Instructions: Pound the chicken breasts to an even thickness.
Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
Dredge the chicken in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan cheese.
Heat olive oil in a pan and cook the chicken until golden brown on both sides.
Place the chicken in a baking dish, top with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Garnish with fresh basil and serve.
